+---------------------+-----------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------+
| Name                | Normal Speak Examples             | Formula                                                       |
+=====================+===================================+===============================================================+
| Random variable $Y$ | -   "If we look at Y..."          | Sample $Y_i, i=1,\dots, n$                                    |
+---------------------+-----------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------+
| Summation           | -   "Sum over the Y's"            | $\sum_{i=1}^n Y_i =Y_1 + Y_2 + \ldots + Y_n$                  |
+---------------------+-----------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------+
| Product             | -   "Take the product of the Y's" | $\prod_{i=1}^n Y_i = Y_1 \times Y_2 \times \ldots \times Y_n$ |
+---------------------+-----------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------+
